original: Lewerth, Carl Gunnar, advokat, Göteborg, f. 8/6/92 i Vänersiborg av bergsing. Wilhelm L. o. Hilma Schly-ter. G. 17 m. Eva Ericson. Barn: Per-Olof f. 21, tingsnot., Borås, Karl-Johan 26, stud. — Stud:ex. v. norra real i Sthlm 10, fil. kand. i Sthlm 12, jur. kand. 17. Tingstjg. i Askims, Hi-sings o. Sävedals hds doms. 17, bitr. sekr. i statens krigsförsäkr :komm. s. å., dispaschörassist. i Gbg 18-19, anst. å W. Kristensens Adv:byrå i Gbg fr. 19, deläg. i densamma fr. 32. Led. av Sv:es adv:samf. sed. 21.
translated: Lewerth, Carl Gunnar, attorney, Gothenburg, b. 8/6/92 in Vänersborg to mining operator Wilhelm L. and Hilma Schly-ter. Married on the 17th of an unspecified month with Eva Ericson. Children: Per-Olof b. 21, court clerk in Borås, Karl-Johan b. 26, student. Completed upper secondary school at Norra Real in Stockholm in 1910, obtained a Bachelor of Arts in Stockholm in 1912, and a Bachelor of Laws in 1917. Served as a court clerk in Askims, Hisings and Sävedal districts in 1917, assistant secretary at the State War Insurance Commission from the same year, dispatch assistant in Gothenburg from 1918-1919, employed at W. Kristensen's Law Firm in Gothenburg from 1919, and became a partner in the same firm from 1932. Has been a member of the Swedish Bar Association since 1921.

workExperience.name: Askims, Hisings, and Sävedal District Courts
